name: UIStoryboardUnwindSegueSource
desc: An encapsulation of information about an unwind segue.

items.name: var source: UIViewController
items.desc: The view controller being dismissed by the unwind segue.

items.name: var unwindAction: Selector
items.desc: The action method associated with the unwind segue.

items.name: var sender: Any?
items.desc: The object that performed the unwind action.
